attributes.action: abolish greenbelt protection and instead ensure that all expanding cities include a large amount of open and green space.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Green Belt Protection is one of the primary factors driving high housing prices and increasingly small dwellings. 

Added to this, far from allowing city dwellers to have access to open green areas, it means cities become even more compact and urbanised than they are.

Preferable to this is that cities be allowed to expand freely while also being under the obligation that a fairly large amount of land within the expanding city be kept open and green.
